content: you will need ricorumi dk cotton 25g balls in pastel shades of pink of peach and green for the stalk 3 5mm crochet hook stuffing or use any size of yarn just remember to change your hook size this pattern is written in uk terms chain chain double_crochet double_crochet us single_crochet half_double_crochet half treble us half_double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st s stitch es now for the boring bit please feel free to make and sell a small number of items created from this pattern but please do not reproduce or distribute the pattern as your own please credit me as the designer and link to me if selling online
